title: The Yattering and Jack
description: Introducing Eclipse Graphic Novels, an exciting new series featuring some of the world's bestselling authors, together with top artists, destined to revolutionize the graphic novel.The Yattering and JackWhat does Jack Polo do when a demonic denizen of hell comes to stay in his house? *Nothing.* The Yattering - the demon in question - is going crazy. He is one dangerous demon, ready to pounce...A new dark fantasy graphic novel from the bestselling author of *Imajica* and *The Great and Secret Show.* Also a stunning adaptation of Clive Barker's story *How Spoilers Bleed.*
author: Steve Niles
